product_name: Brother PrintModa Studio Fabric Printer HLJF1
short_description:
The future of crafting and sewing has arrived. The revolutionary PrintModa Studio Fabric Printer prints custom designs, personalized patterns, and even celebratory templates in vibrant color on fabric and will transform your crafting and sewing experience! The PrintModa Studio Fabric Printer is for the maker who seeks creative outlets for self-expression and takes pride in creating authentic custom creations. And when PrintModa is combined with the highly innovative Artspira1 App, art happens. Connect your digital fabric printer via a wireless network to any Brother wireless connected sewing and embroidery machines or ScanNCut DX machines for even more artistic liberation.
With Artspira, there are a variety of designs to choose from, and the ability to execute minor edits, such as editing text elements, swapping out images, and changing the backgrounds of the templates. All done right on the screen. Designs and artwork can then be wirelessly transferred to PrintModa for printing. Browse the over 100 designs including photo frames, banners, quilt blocks, labels, fabric patterns, and bag/purse designs!
Explore templates and projects in Artspira1 and then transfer your design wirelessly to a Brother wireless enabled sewing or embroidery machine or even one of the expressive ScanNCut DX machines to take your creations to a new level. Produce custom banners, seasonal home décor, and personalized projects, or draw any illustrations and send them to embroidery machines wirelessly.
PrintModa comes with a Brother Genuine LC400 Series CMYK ink cartridge set, printable cotton fabric 11.6" × 1.4 yards (or 51"), a Getting Started Guide with three intro projects, and a trimmer on the back for easy trimming. There are two print settings on PrintModa, and depending on your design, you can choose either rich color printing (vibrant) or eco mode (light) for all your projects.

product_name: Epson EcoTank ET-2803 Wireless All-in-One Cartridge-Free Printer
short_description: Discover a New Type of Printing Experience. Your family needs a printer that’s fast, affordable, and easy to use. That’s why we developed the Eco Tank ET-2803 – an innovative cartridge-free solution that uses high-capacity, easily refillable ink tanks. So you’ll worry less about running out of ink, and save a lot on replacement ink1. The ET-2803 features genuine Epson print quality, a high-resolution flatbed scanner, and convenient color display – making it the ideal basic home printer

product_name: Brother HL-L2465DW Wireless Compact Monochrome Multi-Function Laser Printer, Copy & Scan
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Work from Home, the Brother HL-L2465DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) 3-in-1 Laser Printer is the smart choice for high-quality printing, copying, and scanning. Compact and dependable, the Brother HL-L2465DW combines three functions into one compact footprint, making it a time-saving addition to any workspace. It consistently produces sharp, easy-to-read black & white prints at speeds up to 30 pages per minute(1) (ppm); while the 250-sheet paper tray(2) reduces the frequency of paper refills, and automatic double-sided printing saves time and decreases paper waste. Multiple users can connect to the printer easily from almost any device with its built-in connectivity options, including dual-band wireless and USB 2.0. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or manage your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Advanced security features offer peace of mind as they help safeguard information and maintain secure connections while printing.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer, Copy, Scan & Fax
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Small Businesses, the Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) All-in-One Laser Printer is the smart choice for professional high-volume printing, copying, scanning, and faxing. This powerful wireless printer consistently produces crisp, clear black & white prints at speeds up to 30 pages per minute(1) (ppm). Enhance your workflow with versatile and efficient paper handling features like automatic duplex printing, and a 250-sheet paper tray(2) to reduce paper refill frequency. Complete multi-page copy, scan, and fax jobs quickly with the 50-page auto document feeder(2), or use the flatbed scan glass to scan single pages. Connect quickly and easily with flexible options including dual-band wireless and USB 2.0. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or scan to your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Gain peace of mind with advanced security features that help safeguard your information and maintain secure connections while printing. Combining four critical business functions in one compact multi-function printer, the Brother MFC-L2760DW is an efficient, time-saving addition to any workspace.

product_name: HP LaserJet Enterprise M751dn Wireless Colour Laser Printer
short_description:
• HP LaserJet printers power office productivity with a smart, streamlined design that's reliable and hassle-free. Count on premium quality, maximum uptime, and the strongest security-all intended to drive successful organizations forward.

    Dynamic security enabled printer. Only intended to be used with cartridges using an HP original chip. Cartridges using a non-HP chip may not work, and those that work today may not work in the future.

    Features

    Professional color printing

    Print premium, professional-quality documents with vivid color images and graphics.

    Special print mode for a wider color range, an extra level of vividness for documents and marketing materials.

    Consistent professional quality and performance - Original HP Toner cartridges with JetIntelligence and drums.

    Look professional on every page with vibrant, high-quality color prints that stand the test of time.

    Minimal interruptions. Maximum productivity.

    Change the toner and drum in seconds. Both are easily accessible and come already installed out of the box.

    Avoid interruptions with an HP LaserJet printer designed for maximum productivity.

    Tailor this printer to meet the needs of your business with a wide range of paper-handling accessories.


    The world's most secure printing

    Each printer in your fleet checks its operating code and repairs itself from attacks.

    Your printer's outgoing network connections are inspected to stop suspicious requests and thwart malware.

    Memory activity is monitored to continually detect and stop attacks

    Firmware is automatically checked during startup to determine if it's authentic code-digitally signed by HP.

Epson EcoTank ET-3843 Wireless Color All-in-One Cartridge-Free Supertank Printer with Scanner, Copier, ADF, and Ethernet

The perfect printer for your home office. Your busy office needs a printer that's fast, affordable, easy to use, and has great features. That's why we developed the EcoTank ET-3843 and innovative cartridge-free solution that uses high-capacity, easily refillable ink tanks. So you’ll worry less about running out of ink, and save a lot on replacement ink. The ET-3843 features an auto document feeder, fast printing with outstanding print quality, productive paper handling, a high-resolution flatbed scanner, and a large color display making it perfect printer for building the ultimate home office.

product_name: Brother HL-L2465DW Wireless Compact Monochrome Multi-Function Laser Printer, Copy & Scan
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Work from Home, the Brother HL-L2465DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) 3-in-1 Laser Printer is the smart choice for high-quality printing, copying, and scanning. Compact and dependable, the Brother HL-L2465DW combines three functions into one compact footprint, making it a time-saving addition to any workspace. It consistently produces sharp, easy-to-read black & white prints at speeds up to 30 pages per minute(1) (ppm); while the 250-sheet paper tray(2) reduces the frequency of paper refills, and automatic double-sided printing saves time and decreases paper waste. Multiple users can connect to the printer easily from almost any device with its built-in connectivity options, including dual-band wireless and USB 2.0. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or manage your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Advanced security features offer peace of mind as they help safeguard information and maintain secure connections while printing.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer, Copy, Scan & Fax
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Small Businesses, the Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) All-in-One Laser Printer is the smart choice for professional high-volume printing, copying, scanning, and faxing. This powerful wireless printer consistently produces crisp, clear black & white prints at speeds up to 30 pages per minute(1) (ppm). Enhance your workflow with versatile and efficient paper handling features like automatic duplex printing, and a 250-sheet paper tray(2) to reduce paper refill frequency. Complete multi-page copy, scan, and fax jobs quickly with the 50-page auto document feeder(2), or use the flatbed scan glass to scan single pages. Connect quickly and easily with flexible options including dual-band wireless and USB 2.0. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or scan to your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Gain peace of mind with advanced security features that help safeguard your information and maintain secure connections while printing. Combining four critical business functions in one compact multi-function printer, the Brother MFC-L2760DW is an efficient, time-saving addition to any workspace.

product_name: Brother - HL-L2395DW Wireless Black-and-White All-In-One Refresh Subscription Eligible Laser Printer - Gray
short_description:
Offering the reliable performance you expect
Brother is the #1 Retail Brand in laser printer unit sales in the U.S. (1)

>Prints up to 36 ppm* in black
Generates documents quickly.

Laser printers are best for high-volume printing
They handle large volumes quickly and at a low cost per page. Toner (powder) is used instead of ink, so you get smudge-free images and text.

Wireless and mobile printing capability
Connect this printer to your home or office network with built-in Ethernet or wireless LAN. Plus, print from your mobile device with the free Brother iPrint&Scan or Apple® AirPrint.

Up to 2400 x 600 dpi (dots per inch) print resolution
Thanks to its high resolution, this printer ensures incredible quality and detail in documents.

Large paper trays for high-volume printing and copying
Reload less often with a 250-sheet paper tray and 100-sheet output tray.

2.7" color touchscreen display
Use the intuitive touch screen to print, store files and access business apps** directly from the printer.

USB port for simple connectivity
The high-speed USB 2.0 port offers a standard connection to your PC.

Built-in duplex printing
Print on both sides of the page without turning it over manually to minimize your printing costs and help the environment.

More print, copy and scan solutions
Automatically print two-sided documents, scan documents to your computer or directly to e-mail, send quick faxes and more.

Connect and print your way
Works with Alexa Print for voice activated printing or choose from versatile connection options with built-in wireless or connect locally to a single computer via its USB interface.

product_name: Restored HP LaserJet Pro M402n Laser Printer C5F93A (Refurbished)
short_description: The HP Laserjet M402N is a monochrome laserjet printer. The HP M402N Laserjet prints at up to 40ppm and has a print quality of up to 1200 X 1200 dpi. The HP LaserJet Pro M402n has a duty cycle of up to 80,000 pages per month. Produce professional-quality prints while you save time and paper with Jet Intelligence! Delivers faster 2-sided printing, faster first page out and reduced energy consumption.

product_name: Used-Like-New Canon Pixma MG2522 All-In-One Inkjet Printer, Scanner & Copier with Mazepoly 6FT Printer Cable
short_description:
This item is REFURBISHED. This Renewed product has been professionally inspected, tested and cleaned.
This product has 30 Days limited warranty. We can also help you troubleshoot technical problems and assist with returns.

Meet the Canon PIXMA MG2522 Wired Inkjet Printer, a simple printer for your home printing needs. Print page after page with the PIXMA MG2522 — this Canon color inkjet wired printer makes it easy to print documents and even supports optional XL high-capacity ink cartridges so you can print more and replace inks less often. The MG2522 wired inkjet all-in-one color printer fits perfectly on a desk and it is lightweight enough to move from one place to another if needed. It can be used in the home, office, dorm and more to print, copy, and scan documents— with a paper tray capacity that holds up to 60 sheets of plain paper.

Mazepoly Accessory Include: A Male to B Male Printer Cable(2 Meter)

This model does not support wireless printing

product_name: Brother MFC-L6750DW Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer, Advanced Duplex and Large Paper Capacity
short_description: The Brother Workhorse MFC-L6750DW monochrome laser all-in-one printer is ideal for workgroups with higher print volumes looking for reliability and cost savings. Enjoy great value and a low cost of ownership due to the included super high-yield 12,000-page cartridge‡. This high-performance All-in-One features fast printing and copying up to 48ppm‡, flexible connectivity, and advanced security features for network user authentication. The large 520-sheet capacity paper tray holds more than a ream a paper for fewer refills, and optional trays boost total capacity to 1,610 sheets. Maximize productivity with advanced scanning features and multiple scan destinations and use the 70-page capacity duplex auto document feeder for fast, two-sided scanning and copying. Plus, a customizable color touchscreen display provides direct access to print from and scan to popular business cloud services,

product_name: Brother MFC-J6545DW INKvestment Tank Color Inkjet All-in-One Wireless Printer
short_description: The Brother MFC-J6545DW INKvestment Tank color inkjet all-in-one printer with tank technology delivers reliable performance, enhanced productivity and professional results perfect for small businesses and home offices. The MFC-J6545DW features reengineered INKvestment Tank cartridges along with an internal ink storage tank to deliver uninterrupted printing for up to 1-year without the need to purchase ink(1). Business-capable features include mobile device printing(2), flexible paper handling options, ledger-size scan glass plus print, copy, scan and fax up to 11? x 17?. The MFC-J6545DW offers automatic two-sided printing and easy onscreen navigation using the 3.7? color touchscreen. The Brother INKvestment Tank all-in-one printer with up to one-year of ink in-box(1) provides truly uninterrupted printing, exceptional features, super convenience, large page yields and low-cost printing. Includes a two-year limited warranty with free online, call, or live chat support for the life of your printer.

product_name: Polaroid Hi-Print - Bluetooth Connected 2x3 Pocket Phone Photo Printer with Polaroid HiPrint 2x3 Paper Cartridge 20 Sheets and Microfiber Cloth
short_description: The Hi-Print 2 x 3 pocket photo printer from Polaroid turns the content on your phone's camera roll into a high-quality print that can be stuck on almost any surface. It uses dye sublimation technology to create beautiful, lifelike 2 x 3" prints on self-adhesive photo paper and is compatible with the iPhone 6S and later devices running iOS 12.2+, as well as most Android smartphones running Android 7 and newer. Your smartphone connects to the printer using Bluetooth 2.1 + EDR and 5.0, while its built-in lithium-ion battery prints up to 20 photos per charge and can recharge in an hour using its micro-USB port and a separately sold charger. Seriously Good Printing: Turn your favorite screenshots, memes or moments into a high-quality print that won't fade over time. Create with the Free Mobile App: Make the unreal real with the free Polaroid Hi-Print app. Add stickers, filters, and text to build a world that's uniquely yours. Make Every Idea Stick: The Polaroid Hi-Print prints on self-adhesive photo paper. Print, peel, and stick images on your laptop, phone or on the back of someone you love.

product_name: DNP 4x6" Dye Sub Media for DS620A Printer, 400 Prints Per Roll, 2 Piece
short_description:

Each roll in this 2-pack set is capable of yielding approximately 400 prints, totaling an impressive 800 photos per pack. This makes it an efficient and reliable choice for professional photographers, photo booth operators, and anyone else needing to print a high volume of images without sacrificing quality.

The DNP DS6204x6 4 x 6" Roll Media is not just about quantity, but also about quality. It ensures that every print you make on your DS620A Photo Printer is of the highest standard, capturing every detail with precision and clarity. Whether you're printing for a wedding, a corporate event, or just for personal use, this dye sub media will deliver consistent, exceptional results every time.

Remember, for the best results, always choose DNP DS6204x6 4 x 6" Roll Media for your DS620A Photo Printer. It's the perfect match for your printing needs, combining quality, reliability, and affordability in one package.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer, Copy, Scan & Fax

product_name: Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer, Copy, Scan & Fax
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Small Businesses, the Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) All-in-One Laser Printer is the smart choice for professional high-volume printing, copying, scanning, and faxing. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or scan to your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Gain peace of mind with advanced security features that help safeguard your information and maintain secure connections while printing. Combining four critical business functions in one compact multi-function printer, the Brother MFC-L2760DW is an efficient, time-saving addition to any workspace.

product_name: HP ENVY Inspire 7955e All-in-One Inkjet Printer, Color Mobile Print, Copy, Scan
short_description: From America's most trusted printer brand, the HP ENVY Inspire 7955e is a premium multi-purpose home printer with everything families need to learn, work, and create. Loaded with features to print high-quality photos, homework, office docs and everything else. Includes the optional HP+ Smart Printing System that keeps itself up to date and ready to print from virtually anywhere at any time-at no additional cost.  PERFECT FOR HOME - The HP ENVY Inspire 7955e is great for printing documents, high-quality borderless photos in multiple sizes, creative projects and more. Print speeds up to 10 pages per minute color, 15 pages per minute black.  KEY FEATURES - Print, copy, scan, automatic 2-sided printing, advanced photo features, separate photo tray, auto document feeder, mobile and wireless printing.  INCLUDES FREE HP+ SMART FEATURES - Upgrade free to HP+ during setup to get advanced features for mobile printing, security, automatic updates and more. HP+ only works with an HP account, internet connection and Original HP Ink for the life of the printer.  CONNECTIVITY - Dual-band Wi-Fi® with self-reset automatically detects and resolves connectivity issues. Also includes USB 2.0 port.  HP SMART APP - Simple setup that guides you through each step, using HP Smart app. Print, scan and copy everyday documents from your phone-from anywhere. Get advanced features with HP+ in the Smart app including mobile fax and advanced scanning features such as multi-item recognition.?  VIBRANT PHOTOS - Photos that look as vibrant as they do on your screen with true-to-phone quality prints, plus custom photo features in the HP Smart app. HP 5x5" square and 4x12" panoramic photo paper sizes are optimized for the HP ENVY Inspire series.  3 MONTHS FREE INK when you activate HP+ - Includes 3 months free subscription for Instant Ink delivery service with HP+ activation. Ink ships automatically so you never run out. After 3 months, monthly fee applies unless cancelled, and you save up to 50%.

That’s why we developed the Eco Tank ET-2803 – an innovative cartridge-free solution that uses high-capacity, easily refillable ink tanks. So you’ll worry less about running out of ink, and save a lot on replacement ink1. The ET-2803 features genuine Epson print quality, a high-resolution flatbed scanner, and convenient color display – making it the ideal basic home printer

product_name: Epson Expression Home XP-5200 Wireless Color All-in-One Printer
short_description: Enjoy fast, easy printing with the Expression Home XP-5200. Our fastest Expression Home printer to date, the XP-5200 delivers everyday documents?like to-do lists, homework, coupons and more?quickly and easily. Engineered with Epson?s state-of-the-art PrecisionCore technology, this high-performance, all-in-one solution provides exceptional image quality for remarkable prints and borderless photos for all your creative projects. Plus, it offers a convenient 150-sheet paper tray and simple installation.

product_name: Brother HL-L2465DW Wireless Compact Monochrome Multi-Function Laser Printer, Copy & Scan
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Work from Home, the Brother HL-L2465DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) 3-in-1 Laser Printer is the smart choice for high-quality printing, copying, and scanning. Compact and dependable, the Brother HL-L2465DW combines three functions into one compact footprint, making it a time-saving addition to any workspace. It consistently produces sharp, easy-to-read black & white prints at speeds up to 30 pages per minute(1) (ppm); while the 250-sheet paper tray(2) reduces the frequency of paper refills, and automatic double-sided printing saves time and decreases paper waste. Multiple users can connect to the printer easily from almost any device with its built-in connectivity options, including dual-band wireless and USB 2.0. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or manage your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Advanced security features offer peace of mind as they help safeguard information and maintain secure connections while printing.

product_name: Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome All-in-One Laser Printer, Copy, Scan & Fax
short_description: Best for Small Offices and Small Businesses, the Brother MFC-L2760DW Wireless Compact Monochrome (Black & White) All-in-One Laser Printer is the smart choice for professional high-volume printing, copying, scanning, and faxing. This powerful wireless printer consistently produces crisp, clear black & white prints at speeds up to 30 pages per minute(1) (ppm). Enhance your workflow with versatile and efficient paper handling features like automatic duplex printing, and a 250-sheet paper tray(2) to reduce paper refill frequency. Complete multi-page copy, scan, and fax jobs quickly with the 50-page auto document feeder(2), or use the flatbed scan glass to scan single pages. Connect quickly and easily with flexible options including dual-band wireless and USB 2.0. Best of all, using the Brother Mobile Connect app(3), you can print or scan to your Brother printer from almost anywhere. Gain peace of mind with advanced security features that help safeguard your information and maintain secure connections while printing. Combining four critical business functions in one compact multi-function printer, the Brother MFC-L2760DW is an efficient, time-saving addition to any workspace.
